description:
The psychic duelist Esper Roba defeats Ryuzaki as easy as a chumpasaurus, and Jonouchi’s next on his hit list!  What chance does Jonouchi have when Esper Roba has the telepathic ability to read all the cards in Jonouchi’s hand?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Esper Roba: Danger of the Psychic Deck
エスパー絽場 サイキックデッキの恐怖
